chaos_dimension.name: ⚡ Chaos Dimension
chaos_dimension.description: Only VIPs can enter this unstable dimension full of chaos energy.
chaos_dimension.expedition_desc: Your clan braved the Chaos Dimension and returned with forbidden powers!

cosmic_anomaly.name: 🌌 Cosmic Anomaly
cosmic_anomaly.description: A rare anomaly in the skies. Only VIP explorers dare to approach it.
cosmic_anomaly.expedition_desc: You harvested stardust and cosmic relics from the anomaly!

gods_trial.name: 👑 Trial of the Gods
gods_trial.description: Face divine challenges that test the limits of mortals.
gods_trial.expedition_desc: You passed the Trial of the Gods and received a legendary blessing!

void_prison.name: 🕳️ Prison of the Void
void_prison.description: An ancient prison holding forgotten horrors. Few dare to enter.
void_prison.expedition_desc: You freed forbidden knowledge from the Void — but at what cost?

eternal_flame.name: 🔥 Eternal Flame
eternal_flame.description: The eternal fire burns in a sacred volcano. Only the worthy may claim it.
eternal_flame.expedition_desc: Your clan captured the Eternal Flame and forged weapons of divine fire!

celestial_tournament.name: 🏟️ Celestial Tournament
celestial_tournament.description: The gods host a tournament of champions. VIPs are invited to fight for glory.
celestial_tournament.expedition_desc: You triumphed in the Celestial Tournament and earned a place among legends!

dream_realm.name: 💤 Dream Realm
dream_realm.description: Travel through the Dream Realm to harness illusory powers.
dream_realm.expedition_desc: Your clan tamed the Dream Realm and brought back artifacts of imagination!

abyss_gate.name: ⚫ Gate of the Abyss
abyss_gate.description: The Abyss opens once in an age. VIPs can dare enter its darkness.
abyss_gate.expedition_desc: From the Abyss you brought back cursed treasures of immense power!

time_rift.name: ⏳ Rift of Time
time_rift.description: A tear in reality allows travelers to bend time itself.
time_rift.expedition_desc: You altered time and returned with future knowledge and rare artifacts!

divine_library.name: 📚 Divine Library
divine_library.description: A library of gods hidden between worlds. Knowledge itself is the prize.
divine_library.expedition_desc: You studied forbidden tomes and unlocked new secrets for your clan!

soul_forge.name: 💎 Soul Forge
soul_forge.description: A mythical forge where souls are melted into weapons.
soul_forge.expedition_desc: Your clan crafted soul-bound relics of unimaginable power!

phantom_carnival.name: 🎭 Phantom Carnival
phantom_carnival.description: A strange carnival where nothing is real, yet everything can be won.
phantom_carnival.expedition_desc: You survived the Phantom Carnival and returned with rare illusions!

starlight_temple.name: ✨ Starlight Temple
starlight_temple.description: A sacred temple hidden in the stars. Only the chosen may enter.
starlight_temple.expedition_desc: You unlocked the blessings of the stars and brought their eternal light!

dragon_ascent.name: 🐉 Dragon Ascent
dragon_ascent.description: Climb the highest mountains to challenge an ancient celestial dragon.
dragon_ascent.expedition_desc: You defeated the Celestial Dragon and claimed its treasures!

origin_fountain.name: 🌊 Fountain of Origin
origin_fountain.description: The mythical source of all magic. Its waters grant eternal power.
origin_fountain.expedition_desc: Your clan drank from the Fountain of Origin and gained everlasting strength!
